name: Platformer (desmond123)
description:
Player act as a thief and required to leave the place without getting kill by enemy or trap. Certain actions are required to be act in order to clear the stage.

Arrow key to move

Space to jump

Z to shoot

X to create shadow where player are invincible but consume stamina

CAPS to sneak where player are invincible and consume less stamina but move at a slower speed.

E to interact with object such as block, switch, and chest

ESC to reset the game
